text: Mary Antoinette Hoole (stage name Toni Basil; September 22, 1943) is an American singer-songwriter, dancer and actress. She is best known by the 1982 hit single Mickey. In addition, she has performed in many movies. Basil was born in Philadelphia. ==References== Category:Singers from Philadelphia category:American singer-songwriters Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:American choreographers Category:American dancers Category:New wave singers Category:1943 births Category:Living people
title: Toni Basil
